statements: SELECT * FROM user_measurements WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, weight FROM user_measurements WHERE measurement_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT height FROM user_measurements WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY measurement_date DESC;
SELECT body_fat FROM user_measurements WHERE user_id = 3 ORDER BY height ASC;
SELECT user_id, weight, height, body_fat FROM user_measurements WHERE measurement_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM user_measurements WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT measurement_date, weight, height FROM user_measurements ORDER BY measurement_date DESC
SELECT user_id, body_fat FROM user_measurements WHERE body_fat > 20 AND weight < 70
SELECT * FROM user_measurements WHERE height BETWEEN 160 AND 180
SELECT AVG(weight), MAX(body_fat) FROM user_measurements GROUP BY user_id
SELECT * FROM user_weight_measurements
SELECT weight, measurement_date FROM user_weight_measurements
SELECT user_id, weight FROM user_weight_measurements WHERE measurement_date = '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM user_body_measurements ORDER BY measurement_date DESC
SELECT user_id, height, waist_circumference FROM user_body_measurements WHERE user_id = 'e52e08eb-1b91-4d2d-b76b-581f4ca4d36a'
SELECT user_id, weight, measurement_date FROM user_weight_measurements WHERE weight > 70 ORDER BY measurement_date DESC
SELECT user_id, weight, measurement_date FROM user_weight_measurements WHERE weight < 60 ORDER BY weight ASC
SELECT user_id, weight, measurement_date FROM user_weight_measurements WHERE measurement_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY weight DESC, measurement_date ASC
SELECT user_id, height, waist_circumference, measurement_date FROM user_body_measurements ORDER BY user_id ASC, measurement_date DESC
SELECT user_id, height, waist_circumference, measurement_date FROM user_body_measurements WHERE height > 170 AND waist_circumference < 90 ORDER BY height DESC, measurement_date DESC
SELECT * FROM user_weights ORDER BY weight ASC, measurement_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, height FROM user_heights WHERE height > 170;
SELECT user_id, body_fat_percentage FROM user_body_fat WHERE measurement_date >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT user_id, weight FROM user_weights WHERE weight BETWEEN 60 AND 80;
SELECT * FROM user_heights ORDER BY measurement_date DESC, height DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_weights WHERE weight > 70 ORDER BY measurement_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, height FROM user_heights WHERE measurement_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT user_id, body_fat_percentage, measurement_date FROM user_body_fat WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY body_fat_percentage ASC;

SELECT user_weights.user_id, user_heights.height, user_body_fat.body_fat_percentage FROM user_weights JOIN user_heights ON user_weights.user_id = user_heights.user_id JOIN user_body_fat ON user_weights.user_id = user_body_fat.user_id WHERE weight > 60 AND height > 160;
SELECT * FROM user_weights UNION SELECT * FROM user_heights UNION SELECT * FROM user_body_fat ORDER BY measurement_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Users;
SELECT id, username, email FROM Users WHERE registration_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, weight, measurement_date FROM WeightMeasurements ORDER BY measurement_date DESC;
SELECT u.username, b.height, b.waist_size FROM Users u JOIN BodyMeasurements b ON u.id = b.user_id;
SELECT user_id, gender, age FROM UserProfiles WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY gender ASC;
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE registration_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT username, email FROM Users WHERE id = 5;
SELECT id, username, email FROM Users WHERE username LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM UserProfiles WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age DESC;

SELECT Users.username, UserProfiles.gender, BodyMeasurements.height FROM Users INNER JOIN UserProfiles ON Users.id = UserProfiles.user_id INNER JOIN BodyMeasurements ON Users.id = BodyMeasurements.user_id WHERE BodyMeasurements.waist_size < 30 ORDER BY BodyMeasurements.height DESC;
SELECT user_id, weight, measurement_date FROM UserWeight;
SELECT height, user_id, measurement_date FROM UserHeight;
SELECT bmi, measurement_date, user_id FROM UserBMI;
SELECT user_id, body_fat_percentage, measurement_date FROM UserBodyFatPercentage;
SELECT intake_date, user_id, calories FROM UserCaloriesIntake;
SELECT * FROM UserWeight ORDER BY measurement_date DESC, weight ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, weight, measurement_date FROM UserWeight WHERE weight > 70 AND measurement_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY user_id ASC, measurement_date DESC;
SELECT u.user_id, u.height, h.measurement_date FROM UserHeight u INNER JOIN UserWeight h ON u.user_id = h.user_id WHERE u.height BETWEEN 150 AND 180 ORDER BY u.user_id, h.measurement_date DESC;

SELECT u.user_id, u.bmi, b.measurement_date FROM UserBMI u INNER JOIN UserBodyFatPercentage b ON u.user_id = b.user_id WHERE u.bmi < 25 AND b.body_fat_percentage > 20 ORDER BY b.measurement_date DESC, u.user_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, calories, intake_date FROM UserCaloriesIntake WHERE calories BETWEEN 1500 AND 2000 ORDER BY intake_date DESC LIMIT 5;
